trans_title: 極悪人間魚雷ブルース
introduction: Legendary man, Tenkai Kanou, is back to Asakusa (a.k.a Enko) after being sent into exile for 3 years. Through the good-old Sumida river on the board, he meets this mysterious girl, Ami, who's dreaming to debut as singer in the United States with Enka-Song. With the fellows who admire Tenkai, he keeps expanding his territory by despoiling casinos and the others. And a little help from old-friend Reiji, the executive of Kokubu Group, Takashi, the Comedian. As rampant as Tenkai is, he has always worried about his father who's at the top of Kokubu Group. Tenkai tricks TV producer in order to push comedian, Takashi. But he ends up being arrested. He has crossed the line he never should've. Now Tenkai and co are being targeted by Kokubu Group, even his own father is after him. The fellows are being killed one after one ... now is the time for Tenkai to show why he is the legendary man ...
chinese_title: 極悪人間魚雷ブルース
